pageDescription: Complete the registration form below to enroll your child in Placer Forest School's nature-based learning program for children ages 4-12 years old. Serving families in Rocklin, Lincoln, Loomis, and Roseville, CA.
metaDescription: Enroll your child in Placer Forest School's nature-based learning program. Forest school registration for families in Rocklin, Lincoln, Loomis, and Roseville, CA.

earlyBird.title: üéâ Limited Time: Register by August 31st - Save $80!
earlyBird.highlight: Register by the end of August for just $40! This registration fee will be applied toward your tuition, plus you'll receive an additional $40 discount - that's a total savings of $80!
earlyBird.urgency: Only a few days left to save $80!

discounts.title: Sibling Discount
discounts.description: 10% off tuition for each additional sibling

discounts.title: Charter School Partnership
discounts.description: Please email placerforestschool@gmail.com if you would like to use charter funds - include information about your kids and which charter school you use

specialNeeds.label: Special Considerations (allergies, medical conditions, behavioral notes):
specialNeeds.placeholder: Please describe any allergies, medical conditions, or other important information about your child...

address.label: Home Address:
address.placeholder: Street address, city, state, zip code

medicalInfo.label: Allergies, Medical Conditions, and Medications:
medicalInfo.placeholder: Please list any allergies, medical conditions, medications, or other health-related information we should know about...

dietaryRestrictions.label: Dietary Restrictions:
dietaryRestrictions.placeholder: Please describe any dietary restrictions or food allergies...

waivers.title: Ability to Participate & Assumption of Risk:
waivers.text: I acknowledge that outdoor forest school activities involve inherent risks and that my child is physically and emotionally capable of participating in the program.

waivers.title: Waiver & Release of Liability:
waivers.text: I release Placer Forest School, its instructors, and associated parties from any liability for injuries or damages that may occur during participation in the program.

waivers.title: Medical Emergency Authorization:
waivers.text: I authorize Placer Forest School staff to seek emergency medical treatment for my child if needed and agree to be responsible for any associated costs.

options.text: Yes, I give permission for my child to be included in photos/videos for program documentation and promotional materials

options.value: No, I do not give permission
options.text: No, I do not give permission for my child to be included in photos/videos

additionalInfo.label: Anything else you'd like us to know about your child or family?
additionalInfo.placeholder: Please share any additional information that would help us better serve your child...

notices.title: Early Bird Special:
notices.text: Register by August 31st for just $40 to secure your spot! This fee counts toward tuition and you save an additional $40 (total $80 savings).

notices.title: Program Cost:
notices.text: $11.50/hour per child (5 hours/week for 12 weeks = $690 total). 10% sibling discount available.

notices.title: Next Steps:
notices.text: Your registration is not complete until payment is received. We will contact you within 24 hours with payment details and program information.

notices.title: Our Forest Location:
notices.text: The exact meeting location will be shared upon registration completion for privacy and safety reasons.

submitButton.note: By submitting this form, you agree to our terms and conditions and privacy policy.

successMessage.title: üéâ Registration Submitted Successfully!
successMessage.message: Thank you for enrolling your child in Placer Forest School. We've received your registration and will contact you within 24 hours with payment information and program details.
successMessage.contactPrompt: If you have any immediate questions, please contact us at:
